title: A sermon, preached at the funerall of the right vvorshipfull Sir Robert Boteler Knight of Wood-hall: In the parish of Watton in Hert-ford-shire, the ninth of Ianuary, 1622.
author: Howell, Thomas, fl. 1623.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
